-- | Some utilities for reading and writing SPIR-V files
--   
--   This package exposes information scraped from the SPIR-V spec found
--   here:
--   https:/<i>www.khronos.org</i>registry<i>spir-v</i>specs<i>1.0</i>SPIRV.html
--   This is a very early version, it's not quite ready to be used
@package spir-v
@version 0.0.0.1
